title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: Either both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available when both P1 and P2 are selected, or neither of them should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Select both P1 and P2.
2. Observe the availability of the Open Project and Close Project menu items.
